idea-plugin.name: Base16 Tomorrow Dark Theme
idea-plugin.description: An adaptation of Atom's base16-tomorrow-dark-theme, with workbench colors taken from Atom's One Dark UI theme. Ported from my own VSCode theme of the same inspiration.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.2

Removed underline on Kotlin mutable var.

1.0.1

Updated minimum supported version.

1.0.0

Initial release. All default languages within IDEA supported.
